TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LruCache extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: A cache that holds strong references to a limited number of values.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 maxSize) cil managed

Docs.param: for caches that do not override #sizeOf, this is the maximum number of entries in the cache. For all other caches, this is the maximum sum of the sizes of the entries in this cache.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Called after a cache miss to compute a value for the corresponding key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 CreateCount() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the number of times #create(Object) returned a value.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void EntryRemoved (bool evicted, Java.Lang.Object key, Java.Lang.Object oldValue, Java.Lang.Object newValue);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void EntryRemoved(bool evicted, class Java.Lang.Object key, class Java.Lang.Object oldValue, class Java.Lang.Object newValue) cil managed
abstract member EntryRemoved : bool * Java.Lang.Object * Java.Lang.Object * Java.Lang.Object -> unit override this.EntryRemoved : bool * Java.Lang.Object * Java.Lang.Object * Java.Lang.Object -> unit

Docs.param: true if the entry is being removed to make space, false if the removal was caused by a #put or #remove.
the new value for key, if it exists. If non-null, this removal was caused by a #put or a #get. Otherwise it was caused by an eviction or a #remove.
Docs.summary: Called for entries that have been evicted or removed.

format.a: Java documentation for android.util.LruCache.entryRemoved(boolean, java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EvictAll() cil managed

Docs.summary: Clear the cache, calling #entryRemoved on each removed entry.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Lang.Object Get(class Java.Lang.Object key) cil managed

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void TrimToSize(int32 maxSize) cil managed
abstract member TrimToSize : int -> unit override this.TrimToSize : int -> unit

Docs.param: the maximum size of the cache before returning. May be -1 to evict even 0-sized elements.
Docs.summary: Remove the eldest entries until the total of remaining entries is at or below the requested size.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
